column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Lt. Colonel Riekse :
#Text=I will give it my best shot because I think I can do better then all previous Constitution Party presidential candidates .

#Text=I urge those that believe in my candidacy and understand what I have said and believe to contact their state party chairman 's and go to the convention in April in KS city and lend their hand in supporting me there .

#Text=As to being in the White House in 2009 , realistically , it 's a long shot ; but so was Abe Lincoln in the new Republican Party ; and this year , we have a Democrat and a Republican who will keep our troops in Iraq for another four years .

#Text=This is very true for the Republican and I do n't care what the Democrat who will be , both will also keep our troops in Iraq for another four years ; along with starting another war with Iran .
#Text=Enough .
#Text=Lets end this madness .
#Text=Its time to take back America ; send them a message ; and change the way we vote and think ; for a better America .
#Text=To take a line from Ron Paul , who I admire , and give hope to America , Mad Max for President .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) :
#Text=There are thousands reading this right now .
#Text=What could you say to convince them to give you their vote ?
#Text=Lt. Colonel Riekse : I urge them to go to my web site and read it .
#Text=If they agree with me even 80 % , i.e. on what I have put on my web site , they will want to consider voting and supporting me .
#Text=No one will agree with me 100 % ; that would be strange if they did .

#Text=But I think my political philosophy and stands on issues make me stand far apart from the Democrat & Republican that will be nominated ; and also , our party , the Constitution Party is the one closest to the average American and their way of thinking .

#Text=By going by the Constitution , we will have a stronger American ; a stronger economy for all Americans ; and people will live better with a sound health care , pension system and social security system that will take a lot of stress off peoples daily lives .
#Text=I know and believe in my heart that I and we , working together , can do it .
#Text=The price of gas and diesel fuel is going up for our cars and trucks .
#Text=Mexican truckers , as per the new world order types , are right now taking over the jobs of American truckers .
#Text=The price of food is going up ; the price of oil and natural gas to heat our homes and factories is going up with no end in sight .
#Text=Our national supply of food stocks has been depleted and is at the lowest level in 50 years .
#Text=If you like to eat , thank an American family farmer .
#Text=And know this , NO ONE overseas is going to send us food if we run out of food .
#Text=We need to take care of ourselves .
#Text=We now have very little food in our national reserve to tide us over in years of bad crops , etc.
#Text=We have lost millions of good paying jobs to unfair , free trade ; the tax on our social security and hard earned pensions continues .
#Text=The price of health care keeps going up ; the stock market has gone down , along with it the income of millions of people who depend on that income for their retirement .
#Text=The dollar has went down against the Euro ; now what part of that do you not understand ?
#Text=Neither of the two leading Democrats or the leading Republican will give us real change , but more of the same , just more talk , talk and eye wash .
#Text=Cheap talk do n't pay the bills or help families keep up with the price of gas , food , health care , rising taxes , etc.
#Text=We need real , substantive change to turn around & un-stress America and all Americans .
